column4: how can i get iptables to run iptables-restore on boot?  Also, I have to keep echo "1" > ip_forward on boot as well.. how can I make that permanent?
make a "firewall" script and add it to startup
sudo nano /etc/init.d/myfirewall (writte script with everything needed)  then sudo update-rc.d myfirewall defaults (after chmod +x it)
